short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks useless AI integrations into websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of random LLM integrations into every website you use?

This blocks useless AI throughout the web! AI Block is like an ad-blocker for annoying AI integrations. This will remove:

- Incorrect search summaries
- Random AI chatbots
- AI page clutter
- LLM page clutter

aiBlock respects your privacy 100%. We don't collect any data, at all, or send any analytics. This extension runs entirely locally and without any network access at all. No API calls are made, or data uploaded, at any time.
